newsitem.title: USA: Koch Oil cuts U.S. posted crude oil prices 25.
newsitem.headline: Koch Oil cuts U.S. posted crude oil prices 25.

text.p: Koch Oil said it had lowered the price it will pay for U.S. crude oil by 25 cents, effective Wednesday.
The decrease brings the new price for U.S. benchmark grade West Texas Intermediate to $18.75 a barrel and West Texas Sour to $16.00 a barrel.
Light Louisiana sweet crude is now $18.25 and Oklahoma sweet is $18.75.
